SSYMailto Class Reference

This class contains a single method which creates a plain-text email message. More...

#import <SSYMailto.h>

List of all members.

Static Public Member Functions

(void) + emailTo:subject:body:
 Method creates an email with a given address, subject and body by sending a mailto: URL to the shared NSWorkspace.

Detailed Description

This class contains a single method which creates a plain-text email message.

Member Function Documentation

+ (void) emailTo: (NSString*)  addres
subject: (NSString*)  subject
body: (NSString*)  body 

Method creates an email with a given address, subject and body by sending a mailto: URL to the shared NSWorkspace.

Any characters in any argument not allowed by RFC 2396 will be percent-escape encoded.

Parameters:
address The addressee, email address, of the message
subject The message subject
body The message body
